attributes.review: Nothings loading. It’s just a white screen. I’ve kept it open now for a solid 20 minutes, and still nothing.

attributes.review: it took 2 hours to download and the app was trash and made my wifi slow down. do NOT download it takes up alot of space. he needs to be outvoted honestly
attributes.title: oops

attributes.review: The worst app ever!! It took months to download, the sounds made creatures come into my house and i have a phobia of that. They started to talk to me and they said that whoever the person that was on the screen looked like a walking cheeto 🤢
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app immediately started screaming at me as soon as i downloaded. It said I needed to be “meaner” and “stupider” if i wanted to continue using this app. I have never been so cruelly treated by an app in my life. I do not recommend this loser app.
attributes.title: This. App. Is. A. LOSER

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever gotten before. The first thing I saw when I opened it was a glitching orange face with tiny hands so if you don’t want to see that I recommend that you don’t ever get this app!🧚‍♀️😾
They had sent me fake adds and new articles that aren’t true it also has so many bugs pls take it off the App Store for the safety of others 😘🥰
attributes.title: Horriable app pls delete

attributes.review: Do not download so much spam in support of a homophobic racist 🥵 also to the person who left a 4 star review saying we’re all kids, I am old enough to vote and will not vote for this cheetoh 🥰🥰🥰🥰
attributes.title: Garbage App for a Garbage Person

attributes.review: THIS APP IS THE ABSOLUTE WORST!!! It’s a scam and a complete waste of time. It gives your phone terrible glitches and viruses. It even supports and orange guy, super scary. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone... save some storage guys!! Don’t waste if on this.
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: after i downloaded this app a demon spawned in my living room and cursed me with the worst skin rash i have ever experienced i cannot even put on a shirt it’s so painful. Please do not get this app
attributes.title: it made me get a rash on my back

attributes.review: Wish I could give it zero stars
